repairedDockerfile:
From debian:8.11-slim
MAINTAINER "Ling-Hong Hung" lhhunghimself@gmail.com
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y build-essential g++ libbz2-dev libz-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
COPY STAR-2.6.0c/ /src/
WORKDIR /src/source
RUN make clean
RUN make STARstatic
